PGEL.NS.summary: PG Electroplast Limited provides electronic manufacturing and plastic injection molding services for original equipment manufacturers in India and internationally. The company manufactures plastic parts for a range of consumer electronic products, such as air conditioners, colour TV, DVD players, air coolers, refrigerators, automotive plastic, sanitary ware, washing machines, etc.; assembles AC-IDU, including heat exchange part for Tier-I OEMs; and printed circuit board for various applications, which include flat LED and smart TVs, energy meters, set top boxes, and multimedia speakers, as well as mobile phones, tablets, and refurbishment. It also offers small, medium, big sized, high-precision, and surface critical injection molded components; polymers for various hollow plastic products; moldings of thermoset polymers; and small and medium sized tools for applications in the automotive, white goods, home appliances, lighting, and electrical equipment industries. In addition, the company provides end-to-end assembly for products, such as washing machines, air coolers, and UF toilet seats, as well as owns and operates PU paint shop. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Greater Noida, India.
